name: Luckie & Company
tagline: Luckie merges data and creativity to achieve resul
description:
Luckie merges data and creativity to achieve results luck can’t explain.
 
We’re Luckie.
 
And we don’t believe in luck.
We believe in starting with the end result, then mapping the strategic path to get there.
We believe in digging through data to find unique insights and new approaches that inspire action.
We believe in the power of creativity to produce ideas real people talk about.
We believe in meticulously customizing, localizing, personalizing, and optimizing. 
We believe in overdelivering, than delivering more.
It’s not luck. It’s Luckie.
At Luckie we are dedicated to being
FIERCLY independent
SKILLFULLY strategic
WILDLY creative
INGENIOUSLY Nimble
